thread.title: Patriot Ride For Heroes Enhances Local Real Estate
thread.title_full: Patriot Ride For Heroes Enhances Local Real Estate - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Patriot Ride For Heroes Enhances Local Real Estate
text:
Brad Schmett of Luxury Homes by Keller Williams has today announced that the upcoming Patriot Ride For Our Heroes, set for the fourth weekend of October will be a big boost for local real estate as thousands of participants and attendees head to the valley to take part in the fun and stay to shop for family homes.
Indio, CA
Brad Schmett, Broker Associate with Luxury Homes by Keller Williams today announced that the Third Annual Patriot Ride for Our Heroes charity cycling event scheduled for October 23 and 24th, 2015 will be a big plus for local real estate as attendees and participants head to the Valley and stay over to add a property to their real estate portfolios.
The event will kick off with a pasta dinner on Friday evening between 5 PM and 9 PM, followed by an exciting and rare opportunity to bid on a skydiving event with a Navy Seal in San Diego. Hosted at the Riverside County Fairgrounds in Indio, the cycling portion will commence at 7 AM on Saturday morning, with food and drink stations all along the route. The Vendor Expo will include cycling and sporting attire, veteran booths and plenty of great food and beverages.
Schmett recently discussed the ride, “The Coachella Valley prides itself on its patriotism and dedication to our military heroes and all of our men and women in uniform. This amazing event is filled with honors and accolades that lift up our heroes and give them the respect they so richly deserve. My team and I know that we will be especially busy during this event as many active military will be on hand looking for family homes while they are in the Valley. We are excited and happy to welcome them.”
A fun filled and packed agenda includes a Patriot swap meet, live entertainment, a model railroad display, a search dog/rescue display, a pancake breakfast and so much more. Participants should register in advance but spectators are welcome throughout the event. The Navy SEALs will be on hand to perform a skydiving spectacular and a Patriot Law Enforcement Expo will also be part of the festivities. JFK Hospital will join the event with a Patriot Health Fair and the General Patton Museum will have a military display. Do not miss two action-packed days of patriotic fun!
For more information on the 3rd Annual Patriot Ride for Our Heroes visit http://patriotrideforourheroes.com .
To find out more about investing in Indio, CA real estate visit http://indiorealestateinfo.com .
About Luxury Homes by Keller Williams: Luxury Homes by Keller Williams – La Quinta, is an exclusive, elite and sophisticated group of real estate consultants raising the bar for service in the upper-tier La Quinta and Palm Springs area residential real estate market.
